QuestData.Title: The Field of Honor
QuestData.Description:
Thanks to you, $n, I am free of Matyas's control for the first time in ... well, a very long time.
Now, together, we will seek my vengeance.
I've laid a solemn duty upon you by naming you as my second for this duel. I know not the code in your homelands but in mine, it is your task to secure the field. Matyas and his followers are garrisoned at Witherfall Ruin nearby. Unless I miss my guess, that's where he will have run.
I will prepare for the battle and join you soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Clear Taskmaster Matyas's followers from Witherfall Ruins.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet up with Nadjia at Witherfall Ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, he's certainly chosen a scenic location for a fight.
